This book contains [formulas](/Rules.aspx?ID=250) for [Crafting](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) the 0-level common items from Chapter 6 of the _Core Rulebook_.

_Nethys note: a list of all such equipment can be found [here](https://2e.aonprd.com/Search.aspx?exclude-traits=rare%3Buncommon%3Bunique&include-item-categories=adventuring%20gear%3Barmor%3Bshields%3Bweapons&include-sources=Core%20Rulebook&values-to=level%3A0&display=grouped&group-field-1=type&link-layout=horizontal)._
